duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in working on issues of diverse scope and provide solutions to management for process and system improvements.
Create and provide metrics and data analytics for payroll area to track time billing and payroll information.
Assist in new system implementation and enhance payroll processes for continuous improvement and modifications to systems.
Provide support for system changes including any upgrades or modifications to existing systems.
Process company payroll as part of payroll team and ensure compliance with state and federal regulations.
Assist with validation of time and attendance records weekly through the editing process.
Apply company payroll rules and make corrections to timesheets as necessary, resolving payroll problems and issues.
Perform payroll distribution activities and associated accounting activities under general supervision.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Finance, or Accounting and 2 or more years of payroll experience
